title: Russian lawmakers denounce US sanctions against Russian state media network
content: Russian lawmakers have criticized US sanctions against state media group RT, labeling them as an attack on freedom of speech. The U.S. justice department accused RT employees of attempting to influence the presidential election through a money-laundering scheme. Russian officials deny these allegations and accuse the U.S. of interfering in their domestic matters.
summary: Russian lawmakers have criticized US sanctions against state media group RT, labeling them as an attack on freedom of speech. The U.S. justice department accused RT employees of attempting to influence the presidential election through a money-laundering scheme. Russian officials deny these allegations and accuse the U.S. of interfering in their domestic matters.

title: Tim Walz’s distant cousins rock ‘Nebraska Walz’s for Trump’ shirts, stirring family drama - Here’s what is going down
content: A viral photo shows eight individuals in 'Nebraska Walz’s for Trump' T-shirts, who are relatives of Democratic VP nominee Tim Walz. Shared by Charles Herbster and reposted by Trump, the image reveals mixed political views within the family, adding an intriguing layer to Walz's campaign narrative.
summary: A viral photo shows eight individuals in 'Nebraska Walz’s for Trump' T-shirts, who are relatives of Democratic VP nominee Tim Walz. Shared by Charles Herbster and reposted by Trump, the image reveals mixed political views within the family, adding an intriguing layer to Walz's campaign narrative.

In midst of blackout & chaos, Maduro declares early Xmas in Venezuela
Kamala Harris positions herself as more 'business-friendly' alternative to Biden, proposes $50,000 startup tax deduction: What to know
content: Vice President Kamala Harris has publicly diverged from President Biden on tax policy by proposing a lower capital gains tax rate and introducing a new tax break for start-ups. Her plan aims to attract support from Wall Street and Silicon Valley while making the tax code fairer and prioritizing investment and innovation.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris has publicly diverged from President Biden on tax policy by proposing a lower capital gains tax rate and introducing a new tax break for start-ups. Her plan aims to attract support from Wall Street and Silicon Valley while making the tax code fairer and prioritizing investment and innovation.

title: Apalachee high school shooting: 14-yr- old Colt Gray arrested, 4 dead; Trump calls shooter 'deranged monster' - key details
content: A deadly shooting at Apalachee High School in Winder, Georgia, claimed four lives and injured dozens. Authorities responded swiftly to the morning incident, taking one suspect into custody. President Biden called for action against gun violence. The FBI is aiding local efforts as investigations proceed.
summary: A deadly shooting at Apalachee High School in Winder, Georgia, claimed four lives and injured dozens. Authorities responded swiftly to the morning incident, taking one suspect into custody. President Biden called for action against gun violence. The FBI is aiding local efforts as investigations proceed.

title: Who is Liz Cheney? Republican stalwart backing Kamala Harris over Trump in 2024 US presidential election because ...
content: Former Rep. Liz Cheney has endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris for the upcoming presidential election due to concerns over Donald Trump and American democracy. Announcing her decision at Duke University, Cheney stressed the importance of safeguarding the Constitution and confirmed she would vote for Harris in November.
summary: Former Rep. Liz Cheney has endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris for the upcoming presidential election due to concerns over Donald Trump and American democracy. Announcing her decision at Duke University, Cheney stressed the importance of safeguarding the Constitution and confirmed she would vote for Harris in November.

title: Goldman Sachs predicts biggest boost to economy if Harris wins: 'If Trump...'
content: Goldman Sachs anticipates that Kamala Harris' win will benefit US economic growth over the next two years, while a Trump victory may hinder it. A Democratic government is expected to create more jobs compared to Republicans. Increased tariffs and stricter immigration policies under Trump could negatively impact GDP growth, it said.
summary: Goldman Sachs anticipates that Kamala Harris' win will benefit US economic growth over the next two years, while a Trump victory may hinder it. A Democratic government is expected to create more jobs compared to Republicans. Increased tariffs and stricter immigration policies under Trump could negatively impact GDP growth, it said.

title: 'Context is crucial': Meta oversight board asks firm to reconsider automatic removal of pro-Palestinian phrase
content: Meta Platforms' Oversight Board determined that Facebook should not automatically remove 'From the river to the sea,' a phrase with multiple interpretations. The board stressed context's importance in political speech. Meta appreciated the review, and reactions were divided between support for free speech and concerns about safety.
summary: Meta Platforms' Oversight Board determined that Facebook should not automatically remove 'From the river to the sea,' a phrase with multiple interpretations. The board stressed context's importance in political speech. Meta appreciated the review, and reactions were divided between support for free speech and concerns about safety.

title: China's envoy in New York expelled
content: China's envoy in New York was expelled following the arrest of Linda Sun, a former aide to Governor Kathy Hochul, and her husband Chris Hu. They were charged with secretly acting as agents for China. Hochul's office terminated Sun in March 2023 upon discovering misconduct and has cooperated with authorities throughout the investigation.
summary: China's envoy in New York was expelled following the arrest of Linda Sun, a former aide to Governor Kathy Hochul, and her husband Chris Hu. They were charged with secretly acting as agents for China. Hochul's office terminated Sun in March 2023 upon discovering misconduct and has cooperated with authorities throughout the investigation.

title: Tim Walz's family endorses Trump? Truth behind viral photo
content: The photo became viral and believable as Tim Walz's older brother Jeff is opposed to Tim and is a known Republican supporter. 67-year-old Jeff said he is 100% opposed to Tim's ideology. He also said he would be open to publicly endorsing Donald Trump but is in two minds about dragging the family into politics.
summary: The photo became viral and believable as Tim Walz's older brother Jeff is opposed to Tim and is a known Republican supporter. 67-year-old Jeff said he is 100% opposed to Tim's ideology. He also said he would be open to publicly endorsing Donald Trump but is in two minds about dragging the family into politics.

title: Two killed in Georgia school shooting, White House says Biden briefed
content: A tragic shooting occurred at Apalachee High School in Barrow County, Georgia, resulting in at least four fatalities and numerous injuries. The school was locked down as police responded heavily to the scene. One suspect is currently in custody. Governor Brian Kemp and the FBI are actively involved in addressing the situation.
summary: A tragic shooting occurred at Apalachee High School in Barrow County, Georgia, resulting in at least four fatalities and numerous injuries. The school was locked down as police responded heavily to the scene. One suspect is currently in custody. Governor Brian Kemp and the FBI are actively involved in addressing the situation.

title: Kya Bot Hain! Trump fans accuse Amazon Alexa of 'election interference'
content: Trump supporters accused Amazon's Alexa of election interference after it appeared to support Kamala Harris over Donald Trump in the 2024 elections. Initially, Alexa provided a positive response for Harris but remained neutral about Trump. Amazon has since rectified the error, asserting that Alexa does not hold any political opinions.
summary: Trump supporters accused Amazon's Alexa of election interference after it appeared to support Kamala Harris over Donald Trump in the 2024 elections. Initially, Alexa provided a positive response for Harris but remained neutral about Trump. Amazon has since rectified the error, asserting that Alexa does not hold any political opinions.

title: Revealed! Barron Trump arrives at New York University to attend first day of college
content: ​​Donald Trump's youngest son 18-year-old Barron was spotted at New York University Wednesday to attend the first day of his college life. Barron was flaked by Secret Service agents as he arrived at the Manhattan campus, the New York Post reported. Donald Trump revealed that his son has chosen to study business at Stern.
summary: ​​Donald Trump's youngest son 18-year-old Barron was spotted at New York University Wednesday to attend the first day of his college life. Barron was flaked by Secret Service agents as he arrived at the Manhattan campus, the New York Post reported. Donald Trump revealed that his son has chosen to study business at Stern.

title: 'Finally! A boy!': Putin has two sons with gymnast Alina Kabaeva, claims report
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has two sons with gymnast Alina Kabaeva, Ivan and Vladimir Jr., aged 9 and 5. The boys live in isolation, traveling on yachts and jets, taught by South African governesses within palaces. Their existence had been kept secret until now revealed by Dossier Centre. Ivan is Putin's first son after three daughters -- Maria 39, Katerina 37 and Luiza 21.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin has two sons with gymnast Alina Kabaeva, Ivan and Vladimir Jr., aged 9 and 5. The boys live in isolation, traveling on yachts and jets, taught by South African governesses within palaces. Their existence had been kept secret until now revealed by Dossier Centre. Ivan is Putin's first son after three daughters -- Maria 39, Katerina 37 and Luiza 21.

title: Did Tiger Woods accuse Kamala Harris of having a ‘fake accent’? Here’s the truth…
content: The viral post has garnered over 5 million views and 173,000 likes. However, the quote was fake, and something Woods never said. The account describes itself as the "golf version" of The Onion and The Babylon Bee, which are popular parody and fake news websites known for their humorous content.

title: Alabama man dies after Florida surgeon mistakenly removes liver instead of spleen
content: William Bryan, a 70-year-old from Alabama, tragically died during surgery in Florida after a surgeon mistakenly removed his liver instead of his spleen. This grave error caused immediate and catastrophic blood loss. His widow is now pursuing both civil and criminal proceedings against the surgeon and hospital involved in the incident.
summary: William Bryan, a 70-year-old from Alabama, tragically died during surgery in Florida after a surgeon mistakenly removed his liver instead of his spleen. This grave error caused immediate and catastrophic blood loss. His widow is now pursuing both civil and criminal proceedings against the surgeon and hospital involved in the incident.

title: Why Elon Musk's Grok-2 AI images is raising serious concerns
content: The controversy surrounding Grok AI intensified when it began generating images that included depictions of well-known figures like Donald Trump and Kamala Harris in unexpected and inappropriate contexts. Unlike other companies like Google and OpenAI, which have implemented strict policies to prevent their AI tools from creating images of specific, recognizable people, xAI has taken a different approach. Musk, who promotes a philosophy of minimal censorship and maximal free speech, has allowed Grok-2 to operate with fewer restrictions.
summary: The controversy surrounding Grok AI intensified when it began generating images that included depictions of well-known figures like Donald Trump and Kamala Harris in unexpected and inappropriate contexts. Unlike other companies like Google and OpenAI, which have implemented strict policies to prevent their AI tools from creating images of specific, recognizable people, xAI has taken a different approach. Musk, who promotes a philosophy of minimal censorship and maximal free speech, has allowed Grok-2 to operate with fewer restrictions.

title: 'I am deeply sorry': UK PM Keir Starmer after report on Grenfell Tower fire incident
content: UK PM Keir Starmer issued an apology to Grenfell Tower fire victims following a report attributing the tragedy to government and industry failings. The 2017 blaze, which claimed 72 lives, was exacerbated by flammable cladding. Survivors call for justice as investigations focus on multiple individuals and organisations. In its final 1,700-page report, the inquiry laid most of the responsibility on the companies involved in the building's maintenance and refurbishment.
summary: UK PM Keir Starmer issued an apology to Grenfell Tower fire victims following a report attributing the tragedy to government and industry failings. The 2017 blaze, which claimed 72 lives, was exacerbated by flammable cladding. Survivors call for justice as investigations focus on multiple individuals and organisations. In its final 1,700-page report, the inquiry laid most of the responsibility on the companies involved in the building's maintenance and refurbishment.

title: 'This guy actually brought his kids around Jeffrey Epstein': Donald Trump's old photo viral
content: ​But did Donald Trump ever take his kids to Epstein? According to reports, Donald brought his son Eric who was then 11 years old onto a flight with Epstein and his girlfriend Ghislaine Maxwell. The Trumps flew with Epstein and Maxwell aboard a Grumman Gulfstream II private jet from Palm Beach, Florida, to Teterboro Airport in New Jersey on August 13, 1995, the flight logs showed, a Business Insider report said.
summary: ​But did Donald Trump ever take his kids to Epstein? According to reports, Donald brought his son Eric who was then 11 years old onto a flight with Epstein and his girlfriend Ghislaine Maxwell. The Trumps flew with Epstein and Maxwell aboard a Grumman Gulfstream II private jet from Palm Beach, Florida, to Teterboro Airport in New Jersey on August 13, 1995, the flight logs showed, a Business Insider report said.
